name: Agent of C.H.A.I.N.
description:
Agent of C.H.A.I.N.

A puzzle action game made in 48 hours for the Mini Jame Game #9.

Place all your actions points by left clicking and then start moving by clicking again. While moving you can adjust your speed with the mouse wheel. A level will be successful if you collect all documents and reach the exit.

Source code for the project can be found on Github.

Changelog 1.1.0
  • Fixed level index and timer not resetting when restarting game without quitting
